NamedBuildError.Descriptor: The XML attribute or element is not supported and neglected.
NamedBuildError.Name: NotSupportedFeature

NamedBuildError.Name: WrongWriteMaskValue

NamedBuildError.Descriptor: The string part of the DisplayName is restricted to 512 characters.
NamedBuildError.Name: WrongDisplayNameLength

NamedBuildError.Descriptor: The reference target doesn't exist.
NamedBuildError.Name: DanglingReferenceType

NamedBuildError.Name: DanglingReferenceTarget

NamedBuildError.Descriptor: Each Node shall be the TargetNode of at most one Reference of type HasSubtype.
NamedBuildError.Name: HasSubtypeMulitarget

NamedBuildError.Name: WrongReference2Property

NamedBuildError.Descriptor: Wrong Reference type targeting the Variable component.
NamedBuildError.Name: WrongReference2Variable

NamedBuildError.Name: WrongReference2Method

NamedBuildError.Descriptor: BrowseName cannot be null string.
NamedBuildError.Name: EmptyBrowseName

NamedBuildError.Descriptor: SymbolicName contains characters that are not allowed. Only letters, digits or the underscore (‘_’) are permitted.
NamedBuildError.Name: WrongSymbolicName

NamedBuildError.Descriptor: Object NodeClass: EventNotifier is out of range.
NamedBuildError.Name: WrongEventNotifier

NamedBuildError.Name: EventNotifierValueNotSupported

NamedBuildError.Descriptor: ValueRank value is out of range.
NamedBuildError.Name: WrongValueRank

NamedBuildError.Name: WrongAccessLevel

NamedBuildError.Name: WrongInverseName

NamedBuildError.Name: NodeIdDuplicated

NamedBuildError.Descriptor: NodeId is not defined.
NamedBuildError.Name: NodeIdNotDefined

NamedBuildError.Descriptor: Node cannot be null
NamedBuildError.Name: NodeCannotBeNil
